MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL55 postcode area of Caernarfon affecting properties in Dinorwic, Llanberis and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:53AM. Our engineers have identified an overhead line fault. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of initial difficulty locating the cause of the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.12PM on 23rd February 2021
